name: CHOCOLATE SHOULD NOT BE CHILLED.
description:
CHOCOLATE IS A DELICACY BEST SERVED AT ROOM TEMPERATURE. CHOCOLATE AT A SUB ROOM TEMPERATURE IS CONSIDERED RUINED BY MANY EXPERTS AROUND THE WORLD. NOBODY SHOULD EVER EVEN THINK PUTTING CHOCOLATE IN AN ATOM SLOWER DOWNER IS A GOOD IDEA.

THIS GAME IS A JOURNEY OF AN INNOCENT CHOCOLATE BAR TRAVELING THROUGH THE HARSH WORLD, TRYING TO BE CONSUMED AT A REASONABLE TEMPERATURE. ENJOY.
